component.text: Vérification des paramètres et des routes RIP sur R2 et R3

component.feedback: *** Vous devez saisir la commande exacte et complète. ***
component.existingcommands: Vérifiez les paramètres du protocole IPv6 sur R2.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "rip RIP-AS"
Interfaces:
Serial0/0/1
Serial0/0/0
GigabitEthernet0/0
Redistribution:
None
command.instruction: Affichez la table de routage IPv6 sur R2.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 9 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user
Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP,
EX - EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination,
NDr - Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2
- OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:1::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE75:C3E0, Serial0/0/0
C 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, receive
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:3::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:7A20, Serial0/0/1
C 2001:DB8:CAFE:A001::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:CAFE:A001::2/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/0, receive
C 2001:DB8:CAFE:A002::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:CAFE:A002::1/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, receive
L FF00::/8 [0/0]
via Null0, receive
R2#
command.instruction: Vous êtes maintenant connecté à R3. Vérifiez les paramètres du protocole IPv6 sur R3.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "connected"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "ND"
IPv6 Routing Protocol is "rip RIP-AS"
Interfaces:
Serial0/0/1
GigabitEthernet0/0
Redistribution:
None
command.instruction: Affichez la table de routage IPv6 sur R3.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 8 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user
Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX -
EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr
- Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2
- OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:1::/64 [120/3]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
C 2001:DB8:CAFE:3::/64 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:CAFE:3::1/128 [0/0]
via GigabitEthernet0/0, receive
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:A001::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
C 2001:DB8:CAFE:A002::/64 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, directly connected
L 2001:DB8:CAFE:A002::2/128 [0/0]
via Serial0/0/1, receive
L FF00::/8 [0/0]
via Null0, receive
R3#
command.instruction: Affichez uniquement les routes RIP de la table de routage IPV6 sur R3.

command.deviceresponse:
IPv6 Routing Table - default - 8 entries
Codes: C - Connected, L - Local, S - Static, U - Per-user
Static route
B - BGP, R - RIP, I1 - ISIS L1, I2 - ISIS L2
IA - ISIS interarea, IS - ISIS summary, D - EIGRP, EX -
EIGRP external
ND - ND Default, NDp - ND Prefix, DCE - Destination, NDr
- Redirect
O - OSPF Intra, OI - OSPF Inter, OE1 - OSPF ext 1, OE2
- OSPF ext 2
ON1 - OSPF NSSA ext 1, ON2 - OSPF NSSA ext 2
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:1::/64 [120/3]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:2::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
R 2001:DB8:CAFE:A001::/64 [120/2]
via FE80::FE99:47FF:FE71:78A0, Serial0/0/1
R3#
command.instruction: Vous avez vérifié les paramètres et les routes de RIPng sur R2 et R3.
